::Whistler::
    He turns his head as much as he can so he can just see Rust out of the 
corner of his eye.  "I doubt it sir.  I can't move.  My whole body is numb."  
He tries again to stand up and slowly rises to his hands and knees.  "I think 
I'll be fine, eventually."  He rises to a standing position, a normally 
unimpressive 5' 6".  He looks even more pathetic now his left arm is hanging 
limp and twisted in such a way that it could not be in good shape internally. 
 His right ankle is pointing off to the right and he can't open his right 
eye.  "Look at me do I look okay to you?    Hehahaaheahehehahae."
